newsitem.title: USA: Policy Management restates net lower.
newsitem.headline: Policy Management restates net lower.

text.p: Policy Management Corp on Monday said it was lowering its previously reported 1996 and fourth-quarter earnings after an unfavorable legal verdict.
The company is reducing its 1996 net income to $46 million from $50 million, and its fourth-quarter earnings to $9.6 million from $13.6 million, Policy Management said.
The reduction follows a jury verdict in a lawsuit in which Security Life of Denver charged Policy Management fraud and unfair trade practices, Policy Management said.
On a per share basis, Policy Management's 1996 net income is now $2.47 for the year and $0.53 a share in the fourth quarter.
